page.title: 17Dalkeith Nature Trail
page.content:
The Dalkeith Park Nature Trail is a place of interest. It is situated at the north end of the High Street and is a place where nature and recreation are blended together rather well. It has an adventure playground where children can play. It also has a souvenir shop which sells various items. You can see a wide variety of wildlife and plants.
The Nature Trail has been open to the public for 10 years and costs 65p to get in. It attracts an average of 25,000 people a year. It has the occasional accident, the worst a fractured skull. The environment is well protected and displayed attractively. The 2 nature trails have been selected with 24 points in all, marked on the ground with number posts and with notes of interest for each.
